value:
There must be someone better suited
to liven up the festival than me...
Wait! Is this some kind of prank?!

Festivals are meant to be avoided
and not joined. That's Bernie
social etiquette!

I don't mind admiring flowers and
the like...but I'd prefer to do it alone.

"Wow, the world outside my room
is so wonderful and vast!"$k$p...is exactly the sort of thing I
wouldn't say. I'm going home!

If I can blend in somehow, maybe no
one will find me... Oh no! This outfit
is too bright for that to work!

Oh! I-I guess you found me? This is
a gift I was asked to bring you from
$Nf...

I-I did my best, so that means I can
be done now, right? Bernie is leaving,
and at a hare's pace!

It's just a festival, so...please don't
take it too seriously, OK?

Oh no... I guess a rabbit's foot
isn't that lucky after all...

Y-you're giving this to me? Spring
festivals might not be as bad
as I thought...

H-hey! What's with this clothing?!
I think you pulled the wrong rabbit
out of your hat...

J-just because it's spring doesn't
mean that everyone is excited
to go outside.$k$pThere are still animals that want
to continue hibernating and people
who want to stay in their rooms...$k$pSo, just go easy on Bernie, OK,
Summoner? See you next winter...$k$pHuh? What do you mean people want
to see me in this outfit? Wait, they're
gathering by my room? Now?!$k$pAaah! Why are s-s-so many people
here?! Don't look at me, please!
Don't...look... Ah...$k$p...
Spring has sprung!
Hopping to it!
I want to hibernate...
This bunny bites!
Not very festive...
This outfit was just to embarrass me, wasn't it? Augh, stupid! Can't believe I fell for it! I'm so HUMILIATED!
*yelp* If you want me to go away, just say so! You don't have to push me around!
I'd love to hibernate. No obligations, no people... Just me in my cave, safe and warm.
My favorite part about this whole thing? Probably the candy...
What? You think I'm...cute? Oh, no-no-noâ€”you're not fooling me. You think I don't know a trick when I see one? I'm on to you!
Spring makes me tired. All this outdoor stuff... Can we go back to winter?
So, instead of Bernie-bear, how about...Bernie-bun? *chuckle*
OK, OK!
What?
Do I have to?
